Bayesian Hypothesis Testing

bayesian_hypothesis_testing.Rd

Perform Bayesian hypothesis testing.

Usage

bayesian_hypothesis_testing(
  data1,
  data2,
  test_type = "mean",
  n_samples = 1000,
  burnin = 100,
  ...
)

Arguments

data1

First dataset

data2

Second dataset

test_type

Type of test ("mean", "variance", "proportion")

n_samples

Number of MCMC samples

burnin

Number of burn-in samples

...

Additional arguments

Value

Hypothesis testing results
